prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon that excels in stealth and has a mysterious aura.
Design a Pokemon with sharp claws and a shadowy appearance, perfect for ambush tactics.
Imagine a bipedal creature that can blend into its surroundings, with a striking red and black color scheme.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies cunning and agility, featuring long, flowing fur and piercing eyes.
Show me a fierce-looking Pokemon with a tail that can create illusions and confuse its enemies.
Make a Pokemon that has a sleek, agile body and thrives in urban environments, evoking an air of deception.
Give me a Pokemon with a unique ability to transform into other creatures during battle.
